title: My Book - Volume 2
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: 1  This is a planet
text: Planets are formed of atoms (see This is the atom) and are part of the Solar System (see Chapter 2)

title: 2  This is the Solar System
text: The Solar System has planets (see Chapter 1) and are also made of atoms (This is the atom) and grouped in molecules (Grouping molecules).
crumbs: 2  This is the Solar System
